label: social_support
src_text: Sending you all my positive thoughts and love, hope this is it for both of us!
augmented_text: "Feeling for you and sending loads of love and support your way. Keep pushing through! 💪"

label: social_support
src_text: Too bad about the stigma and illegality of what we do, cause i feels you.
augmented_text: "I may not fully understand what you're going through, but please know that I'm here to listen and offer any help I can. You're not alone in this fight! 💪"

label: social_support
src_text: I just want to offer my sympathy and to let you know you are a great partner to her.
augmented_text: "I may not be able to physically be there for you, but know that I'm with you in spirit. You're doing amazing, keep going!"

label: social_support
src_text: I hope you have the best luck figuring it out ♡
augmented_text: You got this! And if you need someone to talk to, I'm here for you. 💪🏼☕️

label: social_support
src_text: All my sympathy and love for you and your daughter.
augmented_text: If you ever need someone to vent to or just want some company, hit me up anytime. I'm here for you, girl! 💬

label: social_support
src_text: Thank you for being inquisitive and frank and I'm glad we are having this conversation.
augmented_text: "I'm sending all my positive vibes your way as you navigate this difficult time. You got this, and I'm here if you need anything!"

label: social_support
src_text: We can also provide more specific advice if we know what kind of background you have.
augmented_text: "I'm so proud of you for taking on this challenge! You're amazing, and I know you'll succeed with flying colors. Let me know if there's anything I can do to help."

label: social_support
src_text: You made me compile a series of photos of us as friends.
augmented_text: "Haven't laughed this hard in ages! So glad we can still make each other smile after all these years."

label: social_support
src_text: I'd consider it a loss and if you get lucky it may be recovered.
augmented_text: "Wishing you all the best and hoping for a positive outcome. Keeping my fingers crossed for you!"

label: social_support
src_text: All my sympathy and love for you and your daughter.
augmented_text: Wishing you strength and resilience as you navigate this tough situation. You're doing great, and I believe in you! 💪
